name: Christmas Theme for Lichess.org
description: A set to add some seasonal flavoring to your chess games! This set features a Santa hat king, Ice Queen, Elf Bishops, Reindeer Knights, Christmas Tree Rooks, and Snowmen Pawn, along with two Christmas boards to go along with them.

user.name: PureBlue
user.about: My current styles are mostly lichess related. Currently not taking requests.
